title: [K-12] Optical Planar Waveguide Characterization Lab Education: Low-Cost Prism Coupler System Construction and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Geometrical optics basics, trigonometric functions, and experimental data recording/analysis methods
context.additional_context: Education focusing on middle school students assembling optical systems, analyzing experimental data, and acquiring measurement skills using digital devices

learning_goals: Students can assemble prism coupler systems with 80% accuracy to measure optical properties of planar waveguides
Students can graph experimental data to calculate the effective refractive index of waveguides within a 5% error margin
Students can deliver a 3-minute presentation explaining the optical system design-assembly-verification process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
